synopsis.text: Kanamori Sayaka, a pragmatic and money-savvy high school student, teams up with her imaginative best friend, Asakusa Midori, and the talented and secretive aspiring animator, Mizusaki Tsubame, to form an animation club. Midori, who sees the world through an artistic lens and spends her time sketching elaborate landscapes and backgrounds, has always dreamed of creating her own anime. Tsubame, on the other hand, has a passion for drawing the human form and longs to be an animator. Despite their contrasting personalities and approaches to life, the trio join forces to bring their 'ultimate world' to life. As they embark on this creative journey, they disguise their club as a motion picture club and work towards producing animation that will captivate the world. "Keep Your Hands Off Eizouken!" is a vibrant and imaginative series that celebrates the power of collaboration and the boundless potential of animation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
